title: Customers are not filtered in the admin tool
description: Log in the admin, left menu choose customers, try to filter by name or email, returns an empty list

title: Generate invoice does not download the generated PDF V2.0ALPHA
description: Go to invoice details, click on generate invoice, wrong mim type

title: Can add a negative number of quantities produce in shopping cart
description: Number of added products in the cart should be positive Steps to reproduce: 1. Open single product preview page 2. Add product to the cart 3. Open shopping cart then you will see that quantities field can use a negative numbers
